intro: ^Hmph. I should be asking you that question.
^Sorry, I just saw what was happening outside...
agg: ^Concierge: Watch yourself. You shouldn't speak to me like that.
knot: ^Concierge: You know what happened right? There's been a fire in the hotel that has burned a part of it down.
^Well yeah, that's obvious. How did the fire happen?
agg1: ^Concierge: I'm not sure. The police are still looking into who or what caused the fire. But your mom...she died in the fire along with a lot of the hotel guests.
^If my mom is dead...I don't want to sit around and wait for the police to find out who did this.
soft1: ^Concierge: I heard that a lot of the hotel guests have died in the fire. And your mom...has died as well. The police are still looking into who or what caused the fire.
^I want to know who did this to her.
knot1: ^Concierge: I don't know who did this. But I don't know if it is safe for you to be hanging around here. People have been reporting strange things happening around the hotel...like ghost sightings.
soft2: ^Concierge: If you want to find out who did this...you're going to have to talk to more of the hotel staff.
ending: ^Concierge: Hmmm. Well I guess it can't be helped. I would start by talking to the Bellhop. He has the ability to see who goes in and out of the hotel more than me. Oh! And I would ask about the necklace incident...
